Text: not even flac? why would you do this
One cannot complain about not being FLAC when you get the files in WAV format. Just thank the uploader and move on.

One *can* complain when the WAV files are upconverted from a low-bitrate MP3, thereby making the file bigger for no good reason and ensuring further quality loss if the file is converted back to MP3.

Evidence: 1. Files named *.mp3.WAV 2. Sharp frequency cutoff at 16khz. 3. The 192kbps MP3 rip I already had has no such cutoff.

Save your time and bandwidth...find this album elsewhere.
